T02D2836:179a-0: @179a * // dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2836:179a-1: gang zhig dpal ldan bdud bzhi'i dgra bcom byang chub mchog dbang nyid brnyes nas //
T02D2836:179a-2: thugs rjes mi bsnyel lus can gzhan yang zhi ba bla med lam bzang du //
T02D2836:179a-3: smin mdzad dbang stsol las gsum bdag po spyan ras gzigs dbang la btud de //
T02D2836:179a-4: skal ldan ting 'dzin ye shes sems spyod rnam dag dbang bskur cho ga bshad //
T02D2836:179a-5: yid 'ong gnas su bde ba yi //
T02D2836:179a-6: rkyen sogs dam tshig kun ldan pas //
T02D2836:179a-7: snying rje chen po mdun gzhag la //
T02D2836:179a-8: gus pas sngon du gsol gdab po //
T02D2836:179a-10: thub pa chen po 'khor los sgyur //
T02D2836:179a-11: bde chen yum dang lhan cig skyes //
T02D2836:179a-12: dpag med sras bcas bsgom par bya //
T02D2836:179a-13: sna tshogs dngos kun mchod pa'i sprin //
T02D2836:179a-14: kun du bzang spyod ji bzhin du //
T02D2836:179a-15: mchod byas sdig pa bsal nas su //
T02D2836:179a-16: rnam dag dbang bskur de rjes nod //
T02D2836:179a-17: lha dang bdag lus gnas gsum du //
T02D2836:179a-18: rdo rje 'bru gsum mngon bsams la //
T02D2836:179a-19: dang dang thugs rje dam tshig gis //
T02D2836:179a-20: kha dog rim gsum 'od zer dbyung //
T02D2836:179a-21: sku mchog snying po aom las 'od zer dkar po dang //
T02D2836:179a-22: gsung rgyun dri med a'a: las de bzhin dmar po'i 'od //
T02D2836:179a-23: rnam dag thugs bdag h'um las rnam 'phros rab sngo zer //
T02D2836:179a-24: bdag lus ngag yid gnas gsum la reg dri gsum sel //
T02D2836:179a-25: de rjes bdud rtsi dkar dmar sngo //
T02D2836:179b-0: @179b dag byed rnam gsum man ngag bzhin //
T02D2836:179b-1: de 'og ye shes rnam gsum gzhug / mthar ni gnyis med bzhi pa'o //
T02D2836:179b-2: thig le gsum rgyun sbyor ba ni //
T02D2836:179b-3: de rjes blo gros chen pos bsgom //
T02D2836:179b-4: dbang bskur nas ni gshegs su gsol //
